column3: â€œOne look at Monster Cookies and you will see nothing but, trichomes the structure is as dense as the Kowloon walled city once was and the buds are a darker color green  accompanied by hues of purple and dark orange pistils the smell of Monster cookies is reminiscent of Grand Daddy Purp which was surprising because, the smell OG Kush is more dominant in other strains I have smoked previously such as Platinum Girl Scou...â€
